Description:
CALL IT HOME AT PRESTIGIOUS BERWICK WATERS!! READY TO MOVE IN!!
Come home to this contemporary home with many luxurious inclusions throughout such as its high ceilings, convenient floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere. With its well designed open plan informal living, dining and kitchen space this properly represents an immaculate example of a modern property.
As you enter the living area of this property, its spacious kitchen with numerous quality inclusions such as 40mm Caesarstone island benchtop, 900mm upright cooker, 900mm oven and dishwasher is the highlight of this property. Planning of this stunning home provides various storage spaces, BIR and more to spare!
Inclusive of features such as:
- Four bedrooms, all inclusive of built in robes.
- Master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite with Caesarstone
benchtop
- The modern kitchen features a 40mm Caesarstone island benchtop,
900mm upright cooker, 900mm oven and dishwasher
- Ducted heating, and LED downlights throughout
- Remote controlled lock up garage with internal access
- Landscaping, fencing, and driveways all included!!
Owning this stunning house is a great opportunity for you to call home within a well established and convenient location in Berwick Waters!
Why hassle with builders when you can walk right into your very own brand new Turnkey package home! where no expense was spared in the construction of this beautiful and well designed home.
Be the FIRST to inspect this beautiful property as you will be spoilt for choice with TWO similar properties to choose from!
READY FOR YOU TO MOVE IN ASAP!!
CALL TO BOOK AN APPOINTMENT!!!
Rinaldi - 0422 054 137

Description:
404m2, North facing, no easements
Located in the highly sought-after Clyde Springs Estate is this generous piece of land comes with the following features: -
North facing
14m frontage
28.95m deep
Rectangular block
No easements
And comes with all the benefits which Clyde Springs Estate is currently offering including the extensive bus services, walking distance to the proposed Clyde North town centre, train station, access to Monash freeway, South Gippsland Highway, surrounded by extensive open spaces, waterways, parkland, within close proximity to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf Course, Racecourse, Library, an easy half an hour drive to the beach, close to the Chisholm TAFE, Federation University, Hillcrest and Rivercrest college and other quality schools in the area, close to the Fountain Gate, Eden Rise Shopping Centre, Casey Central, Pasadena, Hunt Club, Spring Hill, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and the new centre proposed on Hardys Road, not to mention the mountain views, recycled water for lush green gardens and many more.
Call now to inspect

Description:
BRAND NEW, WITH ALL THE LUXURIES!
This home is built with you in mind. Offering the very best in family living; the home is designed to be functional and adaptable for todays ever changing busy lifestyles. Built to an exceptional quality, for you to move straight into or invest if you wish to!
Featuring four spacious bedrooms plus study. Two bathrooms plus powder room. Master with full ensuite with twin vanities and walk in robe. The hallway from the entrance leads to a large open plan meal and family living area, adjacent to central hostess kitchen. Kitchen comes with 900mm appliances and Stone benchtops, walk in pantry. Extra living/ Rumpus upstairs Completing this family home are the advantages of a double lock up garage.
With access to public transport, including the nearby Cranbourne train station, and surrounded by a variety of education facilities with primary and secondary schools.
At the heart of the Delaray community, the architecturally designed Club Delaray is a place to connect, to meet up and relax with friends, family and neighbours who, like you, have chosen the unique Delaray lifestyle.
Within easy walking distance of your new home, at Club Delaray the choice is yours. Work out in the gymnasium, laze by the pool, enjoy a coffee with friends or relax in the library with your favourite magazine.
The community garden and Mens Shed, both part of the Club complex, are great for pursuing new hobbies, reconnecting with old ones and for meeting people. This precinct is the hub around which a healthy, connected community will revolve.
The inclusions to this home given below.
Ceaser Stone (40mm) bench top in kitchen bathroom and ensuite
900mm stainless steel appliance including dishwasher
European design fittings and fixtures
Front landscaped and drive way
Fencing & gate included
6 Star energy rating
Feature facades
High ceiling
Security alarm system
Square set cornices
Fly screens and much more
You can secure this home with only 10% deposit and pay nothing till you move in! You will also be eligible for FHOG*. Get in quick! Call today to book in a private inspection.
*Please note that all photos are for illustration purposes only*
ONLY one thing left to do...

Description:
Designer Style Living in Berwick Waters
This brilliantly designed, bright and spacious 4 bedroom home with study nook offers enduring family appeal through its subtle style and space off set with neutral tones. Combined with family living and outdoor entertaining space, this stunning home caters marvellously for families, first home buyers or investors.
Boasting a light and bright modern interior, the entrance hall flows seamlessly into the main bedroom with fitted walk in robe and sumptuous ensuite featuring double vanity with stone top and large shower with floor to ceiling tiles. Three additional bedrooms all with built in robes are serviced by the well-appointed central bathroom with modern bath and separate toilet.
Overlooking the meals, the stylish entertainer's kitchen boasts walk in pantry and features S/S appliances, stone bench tops highlighting a breakfast bar and 900mm oven. Further living is enhanced by a separate lounge room or kids rumpus and large living area opening out to an entertaining space - creating superb indoor/outdoor amenities for relaxing with family or friends.
Other features include timber floors, security intercom, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ample storage including walk in linen, high ceilings, fitted laundry, low maintenance garden and double remote garage with internal access.
Meticulously finished inside and out, this home is further enhanced by a much sought-after family friendly location, close to parkland, walking tracks around the lake and just minutes from St Catherine's, St Francis Xavier and Eden Rise shops, all delivering the highly desirable family lifestyle benefits the area is renowned for.
Insights: 41 Riverstone Boulevard, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 274 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Description:
Massive land block, Ideal location!
Bloom Estate: If you are looking for a good sized land block to build the house of your dreams, you need to look no further!
This massive Titled Land block 512sqm (16 X 32) is located in the most spectacular and sought after Bloom Estate in Clyde North.
Not just the size, but the positioning of the land will also impress you. It's a south facing block with a beautiful 16 metre frontage, which translates into maximum sunlight warming up your living areas and back yard! And light is life!!
The land block is located very conveniently close to good schools, colleges and the Casey Fields sporting facility, which is a major attraction for the whole of Casey! No facility too far as you are surrounded by the like of The Cranbourne Park Shopping Cantre, Casey Central Shopping Centre,
Fountain Gate Shopping Centre and many more. Doctors, pharmacies, banks,fuel stations are at the stones throw. Primary and secondary schools very close. When it comes to public transport, the block isn't far from the Cranbourne train station, Merinda Park train station or the Berwick train station.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days.
Name it and you have it!
It's hard to find that big a land block at that great a location. So hurry and help Hardeep Singh make it yours! Call 0406676197
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Description:
Circa bonanza
This is your chance to purchase this stunning property in the sought after Circa Estate in the heart of Clyde North. In a fantastic location with a large choice of both public & private schools, some of the most prestigious only a short drive away. With all the needed amenities right at your doorstep, including a short drive to the famous Eden Rise Shopping Centre, M1 freeway access, this property boasts so much more than its location.
Includes:
- Four generous size bedrooms plus a study all with built in robes, the master bedroom with its own walk in robe, ensuite, and its own little retreat area.
- A modern spacious kitchen with all stainless steel appliances, built in pantry, stone benches, glass splash back and heaps of storage and bench space. A perfect spacious kitchen for a family.
- Three separate living rooms, great for entertaining guests, with one a perfect theater room for those cold nights in.
- A full enclosed entertaining area with a built in kitchen.
- Evaporative cooling and ducted heating including a gas fireplace.
- Double lock up garage with internal access and side access.
Situated on a massive 481 sq block, this is a property that will suit everyone's needs, please contact Victor from OBrien Real Estate as this will fly out the door.

Description:
Town Homes with Park Frontage!
This is a rare opportunity to own a park facing spacious & Luxurious home in the most sought-after area in Clyde North
Located in KiloraPark estate, next to future Minter Farm Berwick and Circa Estate, these Town Homes have everything a modern family hope for
These homes come with large master bedroom with walkin robes & ensuite (double vanity & double size shower with tile shower base), three more spacious bedrooms, modern kitchen with large island benchtop, glass flashback, walkin pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances, multiple living zones and a private backyard
Your new home luxury inclusions:
- Designer kitchen with Caesarstone grand island benchtop
- Luxury 900mm European style stainless steel appliances
- Convenient walk-in pantry
- Quality carpet and quality timber look-flooring throughout
- Luxury basins and deluxe tapware
- Driveway, path and fencing
- Convenient remote control garage door
- Contemporary landscaped
- 50 year structural warranty
- Great land size
- Recycle water on tap
- Fast NBN internet speed though-out estate
These homes are located walking distance from Hillcrest Christian College & Rivercrest Christian College and future Berwick Water Town Center, short drive to Berwick chase Primary School, access to Monash Freeway
Private inspections welcome. Call to obtain directions.

One Year Young

Comprising four bedrooms, huge walk in robe & ensuite, second bathroom, stunning kitchen with a walk in pantry, stone bench tops, large oven, hotplate & dishwasher. Modern, light and bright meals/living area with a separate theatre room, quality soft furnishings, tiled living areas and entry, ducted heating & evaporative cooling. Outdoors provides alfresco dining, double garage with internal access, fenced yard, side gate, paths & aggregate driveway. Popular Clydevale location. View now!

Description:
3 Years Young - Just Move In!
This three-year young home, on a desirable 350sqm approx. block in the highly sought-after Berwick Waters Estate is now on offer. Attractive street presence is established with a modern façade and landscaped gardens - drawing you in to your new home. The open plan living being the focal point - comprises of hostess kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ample bench and cupboard space, open to a sizeable dining and living area. The master bedroom features WIR, as well as private ensuite, while the two remaining bedrooms are serviced by BIR and main bathroom. Bypass the stress of building with this quality built, near new abode. Immaculately presented with nothing to do but move in!
The living area flows to the impressive alfresco with heating and element blockers - ideal for year-round hosting, with plenty of room for family and friends on the extensive deck. Patio area, low maintenance gardens and grassed space for the kids complement this exceptional home.
Comforts include but are not limited to; ducted heating, evaporative cooling and internal access from the double lock up garage.
Prime position, with close proximity to Eden Rise, Casey Central, Berwick Village, distinguished schools, freeway access, public transport as well as sport and medical facilities.
Call today to make this your home tomorrow.

Description:
Family Home in Clyde North
Located in the heart of St Germain Estate - Clyde North is quickly becoming one of the most sought after suburbs in the City of Casey. This is an ideal chance to get in on the ground floor whether you’re a first home buyer, upsizer or investor. Own this absolute immaculate 21 SQ large family home complete with an open plan, light and bright, combined living/dining space. Featuring 4 generous sized bedrooms (master with WIR and remaining bedrooms with BIR), 2 bathrooms (master with ensuite), and double lockup garage. The homes comfort is completed with the turn key package on offer, ready to go at completion for you to move into or simply rent out immediately. Ready to move into well before Christmas. All that required is 10% deposit, balance to be paid at settlement. No progress payments needed!
Turn-key perfection with front landscape included however rear landscaping and fences can be arranged at a small additional cost.
Built by a well-known and established local builder. Quality is certainly not compromised & peace of mind certainly at ease. View their previous quality of work at www.platinumdb.com.au
Includes bonus features:
-St Germain Estate
-6 Star Energy Rating
-Render finish Brickwork to Front as per plans
-2740mm (9ft) Ceilings
-Recycled Water Connection to w/c’s
-Solar Hot water System with Instant Gas booster
-Sectional Wood grain Garage Door with Remote Control
-Porcelain Floor tiles to Wet Areas
-Porcelain Wall tiles standard heights bathroom and Ensuite
-Omega Laminate flooring to Entry, Hall, Family/Meals & Kitchen
-Quality Carpets to Balance of Dwelling
-67mm Architraves & Skirting’s & Wood Grain Internal Doors
-Chrome Lever Handles (privacy locks to Bedrooms and Bathrooms)
-Melamine Wardrobe fit out with draw bank & extra shelves to Master Robe
-Vinyl Sliding door robes to Bed 2, 3 and 4
-Chrome Mixer Taps Throughout
-LED Down Lights throughout
-Modern Polytec Melamine Kitchen & Vanities.
-Above Counter Modern Basins
-20mm Stone benchtops to kitchen and vanities
-Under mount SS sink to kitchen
-Technika Stainless Steel Appliances Incl Dishwasher
-Glass Splash back to kitchen
-Semi Framed Shower screens with Pivot Doors
-Polished edge Mirrors
-Coloured Concrete Drive & Path
-Gas Ducted Heating throughout
-High Performance Evaporative Cooling throughout
-Fly screens to all windows and Sliding Door
-Rolla-blinds Blinds Throughout
-Ready to Move in well before Christmas
How does your HOME compare? Find out now – call 9793 7119 to speak with one of our area specialists and request a 6 month sales history report for your suburb FREE

Description:
Near new family home with huge backyard
This fantastic four bedroom comes with nothing to do but move in and unpack and is set right the heart of the fast- growing Ramlegh Springs Estate. With a functional floor plan offering multiple indoor and outdoor living options for the growing family, this under 1 year old home offers:
- Open plan lounge and living with a separate rumpus /theatre room.
- A gorgeous kitchen complete with tiled splash back, stone bench tops, quality stainless steel appliances including, dishwasher, 900mm oven, 900mm gas cook top, pantry and double sink
- Dining area adjoining the family room, perfect for family living or entertaining guests.
- 4 large bedrooms with built in robes - Master with full ensuite and walk in robe.
- Large family bathroom with bath, shower, plenty of bench space, basin and storage cupboards.
- Undercover alfresco leading to the HUGE rear yard with freshly laid turf, complimented with brand new timber fencing, plenty of room for the kids, pets or even a pool.
Further features include, remote control double garage, quality window furnishings, ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, linen closet, down lights throughout, second living area, internal access from the garage.
This home is a rare offering in this young estate, perfectly located within a short drive to all amenities in Berwick and Clyde North. Also within reach of Clyde Primary School and Pasadena Shops

This gorgeous family home is designed, styled & built to impress. A perfect choice for first home buyers & your growing family. Stunning street appeal & offers you:
* Four spacious bedrooms. Oversized master bedroom with large (WIR) plus a private ensuite. Remaining bedrooms all generously sized with fitted robes plus share a further bathroom.
* Impressive kitchen with stone bench tops, loads of bench space, under bench & overhead cupboards space, quality appliances plus dishwasher.
* Large & open planned main living area plus secondary separate living zone or perfect kids play area.
* Lovely alfresco entertaining area with extended deck that overlooks the low maintenance backyard space.
This home is further completed by ducted heating, 2 x air conditioners, floating timber look flooring, stone bench tops to ensuite, & bathrooms, double window furnishings, heigh ceilings, remote double garage with internal house access & so much more...
Extremely close & waking distance to the local Heritage Parklands, St Peters College, shopping complex & even Mc Donald's.
A Must see....

Description:
ENTRY LEVEL BUYING IN CLYDE NORTH!
Situated in the exclusive Cascades on Clyde estate sits this impeccable 4 bedroom family residence complete with a great sized master with walk in robes and full en suite!
The hostess kitchen is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 600mm range hood and a 4-burner cook top, tiled splash back, caesar stone bench tops, ample cupboard/storage options, all this and a whole lot more overlooking the separate meals and rear living zone.
Those who like to entertain are bound to enjoy the multitude of separate living areas on offer, especially the generous sized alfresco area. There is enough space for the entire family to enjoy!
Added extras include: ducted heating & evaporative cooling, exposed aggregate driveway, neutral tones throughout, low maintenance gardens, internal access plus much more!
This is a tremendous opportunity for a family who insists on nothing but the best! Surrounded by top end properties the location is second to none and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands.
Other estate features include Class-A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities, playgrounds and walking tracks. Those who are business savvy will appreciate this Telstra smart community positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne.
Minutes away from Freeway access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre, not to mention walking distance from the Selandra rise shopping centre!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
TITLED 499M2 BUILDING BLOCK IN POPULAR DELARAY ESTATE - FRONTAGE OF 16 METRES!
Searching for a tranquil location? Requiring an estate offering family-friendly living? Wanting to be within close proximity to parkland, with a picturesque creek, and proposed shopping amenities? Your wish is my command!
This spacious, titled allotment is truly a prime piece of real estate and provides the perfect foundation to create your dream home whilst enjoying the quality lifestyle on offer in Delaray! Measuring a generous 499m2 (frontage of 16m with a depth of app. 31.1m) the land itself is regular in shape.
Set in a beautiful, undulating pocket of Clyde North, Delaray has been designed to provide the very best that a new community can offer. The grand master plan is the outcome of a detailed and thoughtful design and planning process with the objective of providing local residents with a liveable, walkable and vibrant local neighbourhood.
Delaray will be a boutique community having it's own club facilities, enhanced by inspiring central wetlands, a neighbourhood shopping precinct/town square, medical facilities, local sporting grounds/ovals, landscaped parks/gardens, leafy green streetscapes and a community centre. There is even going to be a childcare facility and a primary school!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne, this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre. With further shopping precincts available in the Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club estates, local amenities are always going to be close. The recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre also offers an abundance of additional cafes and restaurants.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call Rohullah today before it's too late!

Description:
Build Your Dream Home!
This 511m2 block of land is located in the sought after Highgrove Estate of Clyde North and is surrounded by quality homes.
Located nearby to this lovely block is the Heritage Park, Selandra Rise Dog Park, Clyde cricket club, playgrounds, bike tracks as well as easy access to local shops,and a number of quality schools to choose from. You also have close access to South Gippsland Freeway.
Buy now and build the family home of your choice.

Description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM FAMILY HOME ON 475m2
Located within the beautifully landscaped surrounds of St. Germain Estate, this approx. 475m2 allotment offers a fabulous opportunity to realise your luxury dream home. Whether you're an investor or first home buyer, looking to build your dream home, this allotment is perfect for you.
St. Germain is a showcase development for the City of Casey. A community with its own town centre, great residential homes, major infrastructures, healthcare centres and many other facilities. St Germain is truly an estate to call home. This is a one-time opportunity that you don't want to miss out.

Description:
Simonds built in Highgrove
Located in the popular Highgrove Estate and offering you convenient modern family living this Simonds built home will be sure to impress. Situated on a 448 square meter allotment and just meters away from fantastic park facilities this property would be perfect for the growing family or even the savvy investor.
Features include:
- 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite & walk in robe
- 2 separate living zones
- Quality kitchen with stone tops & stainless appliances
- Merbau decked entertaining area & landscaped gardens
Extra features include ducted heating, split system cooling, double lock up garage with internal access, side access with parking space for the trailer or boat and much more. As one of the fastest developing suburbs in Melbourne this home offers its new owners a world of opportunity. Don't miss out and inspect today!
Insights: 3 Walbrook Drive, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 274 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Description:
Vendor asking $390,000
Land, Location and Lifestyle
Rarely will you find such a quality lifestyle opportunity offered to the market in such an exciting and fast-developing location.
Located just 45 minutes southeast of Melbourne this magnificent new development is centrally located to everything a growing family could need, and provides the opportunity for the lucky new owners to build the home they've always dreamed of (STCA).
With proximity to Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, St Peter's Secondary College and St Thomas the Apostle Primary School, with access to an exclusive residents-only club which has a fully-equipped gym, tennis court, pools, function room and cafe the position could not be better. There's an abundance of local parklands to explore with the kids and pets, communal barbecue areas, running tracks and even basketball courts close by.
Poised to be within walking distance of the soon to be built new town centre, proposed childcare centre, plus the Eden Village Shopping Centre, with great connection to the Berwick-Cranbourne Road, the South Gippsland Highway and the Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, a truly family focused and connected lifestyle awaits.
- Amazing opportunity to snap up a quality piece of land in a developing suburb
- Property is perfectly positioned to local parklands, schools and shopping centres
- Potential for a new family to build the home they've always dreamed of (STCA)
- Proximity to the soon to be built new town centre
- Chance to purchase in a fast-developing suburb 45mins from Melbourne CBD
- Great connection to the Berwick-Cranbourne Road and the South Gippsland Highway
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days
Insights: 114 Thoroughbred Drive, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019.
